properties.id: The ID of the payment provider.
properties.is_enabled: Whether the payment provider is enabled.

properties.id: The ID of the payment session.
properties.currency_code:
The currency code of the payment session.

@example usd
properties.provider_id: The ID of the Payment Module Provider used to process the payment.
properties.data: The data of the payment session that's useful for processing with third-party services. Learn more in [this documentation](https://docs.medusajs.com/resources/commerce-modules/payment/payment-session#data-property)
properties.context: The context of the payment session, such as the billing address or the customer's email.
properties.status: The status of the payment session
properties.authorized_at: The date the payment session was authorized.
properties.metadata: Holds custom data in key-value pairs.

properties.id: The ID of the payment collection.
properties.currency_code:
The currency code of the payment collection.

@example usd
properties.amount: The amount of the payment collection
properties.authorized_amount: The authorized amount of the payment collection
properties.captured_amount: The captured amount of the payment collection
properties.refunded_amount: The refunded amount of the payment collection
properties.completed_at: The date the payment collection was completed
properties.status: The status of the payment collection
properties.metadata: Holds custom data in key-value pairs.

properties.id: The ID of the refund reason.
properties.label: The label of the refund reason
properties.description: The description of the refund reason
properties.metadata: Holds custom data in key-value pairs.

properties.note: A note with more explanation about the refund
properties.created_by: The ID of the user that created the refund.
properties.metadata: Holds custom data in key-value pairs.

properties.currency_code:
The currency code of the payment.

@example usd
properties.provider_id: The ID of the Payment Module Provider used to process the payment.
properties.data: The data of the payment that's useful for processing with third-party services. Learn more in [this documentation](https://docs.medusajs.com/resources/commerce-modules/payment/payment-session#data-property)
properties.metadata: Holds custom data in key-value pairs.
properties.captured_at: The date that the payment was captured.
properties.canceled_at: The date that the payment was canceled.

properties.metadata: Holds custom data in key-value pairs.
properties.created_by: The created by of the capture

properties.id: The ID of the payment method token.
properties.provider_id: The ID of the Payment Module Provider this token belongs to.
properties.data: The data of the payment method token useful for retrieving the payment details from the third-party service.
properties.name: The name of the associated saved payment method.
properties.type_detail: The details of the saved payment method's type.
properties.description_detail: The details of the saved payment method's description.
properties.metadata: Holds custom data in key-value pairs.
